dcterms:creator: K. Gandhi
G. Stojnic
B. M. Lake
M. R. Dillon
dcterms:description: A benchmark designed to assess the ability to discern the goals, preferences, and actions of others, particularly in the context of infants' understanding of social interactions.
dcterms:title: Baby Intuitions Benchmark (BIB)

dcterms:creator: H. Wimmer
J. Perner
dcterms:description: A classic test used to evaluate the understanding of false beliefs in children, where one character's belief about the location of an object is manipulated to assess their theory of mind.
dcterms:title: Sally-Anne Test

dcterms:creator: M. Chevalier Boisvert
L. Willems
S. Pal
dcterms:description: A minimalistic gridworld environment designed for reinforcement learning tasks, allowing for the simulation of various scenarios to test artificial agents' theory of mind capabilities.
dcterms:title: gym-minigrid framework
